toolboxes.name: Default
toolboxes.definition: <toolbox useEvents="yes"><category name="Control Blocks" colour="20" optional="no"><block type="robot_on_program_start"></block><block type="robot_loop_start"></block><block type="wait"></block><block type="quantifier_two"></block><block type="quantifier_three"></block></category><category name="Movements Blocks" colour="330" optional="no"><block type="robot_move_forward"></block><block type="robot_move_turn_left"></block><block type="robot_move_turn_right"></block><block type="robot_move_stop"></block></category></toolbox>
